/opt/odroid-x2/compiler/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++   -std=c++11  --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk    -Wl,--allow-shlib-undefined --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk CMakeFiles/serial-test.dir/unix_serial_tests.cc.o  -o /root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib/serial/serial-test  -L/root/catkin_ws/odroid-build/serial/gtest -rdynamic ../gtest/libgtest.so /root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib/libserial.so -lutil -lpthread -lrt -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/root/catkin_ws/odroid-build/serial/gtest:/root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib
